text:
@DoctorHenryCT @queenymom No coronavirus has ever had a vaccine.
What companies are ramping up now?
It will take time for them to get up to speed & FDA approved to manufacture it, especially when they don't know the formulation and don't know what ingredients to stock up on now.
Another #TooLittleTooLate

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks
